GR13cakbhavu:365: Q: svānandatas tribhuvanaṃ kavalaṃ vidhāya & svātmānam apy atitarāṃ samadā grasantī
GR13cakbhavu:370: Viv: bāhyavyāvṛttivigamapūrvakam antarmananam anantatayā sphuraṇam antarmānaṃ tadvidhau,
GR13cakbhavu:372: cittam eva cintāmaṇir bhavatsamāveśena tadvad eva saṃkalpamātreṇa sarvasamullāsāt //42//
GR13cakbhavu:375: Viv: prāṇā eva teṣāṃ vā sarvasvam āṇavaṃ svarūpaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:377: mokṣalakṣmyā bhavaunmukhyaparāvṛttāyāḥ saṃviddevyāḥ karāmbhasi paramavīciniḥṣyande jātaṃ yat pātram pātatrāṇātmakam aviluptam avadhānaṃ,
GR13cakbhavu:380: tad evaṃ māyopakalpitatattadavacchedavicchedikramākramacakracāramahāsāmarasyasamāpattipratipādanena yad eva ``namaḥ sūryakalā'' ityādinā prakrāntaṃ tad eva paryavasitam //43//
GR13cakbhavu:381: CakBhst_44ab: saṃsāravāridheḥ santaḥ & paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
GR13cakbhavu:386: CakBhst_45cd: śreyas tena jagat kṛtsnaṃ & dveṣadoṣād vimucyatām
GR13cakbhavu:390: Q: māyeyaṃ bahurūpatām upagatā nānā yathā te vibho & vidyāpy evam anantabhedagahanā no cet kathaṃ syād idam /
GR13cakbhavu:391: Q: naiḥsvābhāvyagamena ke cana pare vaiviktyataḥ ke 'pi vā & sārvātmyena pare taduttaradṛśā muktāḥ pare sarvatah //
GR13cakbhavu:393: Q: yady atattvaparihārapūrvakaṃ & tattvam eṣi tad atattvam eva hi /
GR13cakbhavu:394: Q: yady atattvam atha tattvam eva vā & tattvam eva nanu tattvam īdṛśam //
GR13cakbhavu:396: CakBhst_46ab: stotraṃ gṛhāṇa parameśvara viśvasākṣin & mānāvamānamatojjhitacittavṛtteḥ
GR13cakbhavu:399: mānāvamānayoḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇayor niṣprapañcaprapañcayor mamatayojjhitā cittavṛttir yasya tadyuktā vā tyaktā cittavṛttir yena,
GR13cakbhavu:401: ahaṃkṛd eva vāṅghris tadyugam anāvaraṇajñānakriyārūpaṃ tasya pīṭhaṃ paramaśivarūpaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:403: avabodhabhūtivibhavena avaguṇṭhitā ācchāditās tanavo mitatayā sphurantaḥ sarvabhāvā yena,
GR13cakbhavu:405: kaṃ mahāsvātantryarūpam anavacchinnaṃ brahma pālayati gopayatīti nṛkapālaṃ karparaṃ tat pāṇau ekasmin udbubhūṣāmarīcilakṣaṇe mitatayā iyattayā tulitaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ //46//
GR13cakbhavu:407: CakBhst_47cd: cakre ciccakranāthasya & śambhor bhāvanutiṃ parām
GR13cakbhavu:408: Viv: ``nirastaśāstrārthavikalpajālā & devyāḥ śmaśāne karavīrakākhye'' iti dṛśā bhasmaśabdavyākhyānavarṇitasvarūpe mahāpāśupatodyāne,
GR13cakbhavu:409: bhairavāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ patir akalitaciccakreśvarātmakas tadudyāne tadūrdhvayāne sarvātiśāyini,
GR13cakbhavu:412: mahati tapasi citsamāveśamaye bhavaḥs tāpasaḥ ciccakranāthasya---
GR13cakbhavu:415: ityādinā rājānakotpaladevanirvarṇitasvarūpasya śambhoḥ śreyaḥprabhavasya bhāvena sarvabhāvaikyasamāpattisamāveśamayena nutiṃ parāṃ cakre,
GR13cakbhavu:420: stotre bhāvopahāre vivaraṇam akarod ramyadevo dvijanmā &janmādyāyāsabhaṅgapravaṇamatilasatsadrahasyopadeśaḥ //
